title: Gio Ponti Catalogue Font ???
content:
Hello everyone,

I am trying to look for the font used in this retrospective of italian designer Gio Ponti..  
I was trying identifont but could not find any valuable information.. I hopt you can help me!  
Hopefully the images will be enough, I tried to include Capital size, figures...

Thanks a lot for your help
